docna.cdata!:
Jamaica - Technical Assistance Project :
            Loan 2106 - Loan Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Jamaica - Technical Assistance
            Project : Loan 2106 - Loan Agreement - Conformed

abstracts.cdata!:
The project includes: (a) measures to
            increase current savings of major public enterprises,
            promote domestic savings, and improve efficiency in the
            allocation of foreign exchange; (b) support in establishing
            new medium-term development lending institutions; (c)
            assistance in establishing a system for the preparation and
            monitoring of a rolling three-year Public Sector Investment
            Program; (d) development of programs for better utilization
            of agricultural lands; (e) external marketing organizations
            and price incentives to farmers; (f) rehabilitation of
            production and exports of bananas; (g) studies and
            assistance related to the strengthening of agricultural
            sector institutions; (h) preparation of an Action Program to
            increase nontraditional exports; (i) study of a phased
            elimination of quantitative restrictions to imports and
            their replacement by increased tariff protection; (j)
            studies on the rehabilitation of selected industrial
            subsectors; and (k) technical assistance to the Ministries
            of Industry and Commerce and Agriculture.
